org.nodex.java.core.logging

Class Log4jLogDelegate

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nodex.java.core.logging.Log4jLogDelegate
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LogDelegate

    public class Log4jLogDelegate
extends java.lang.Object
implements LogDelegate
    A LogDelegate which delegates to Apache Log4j
    Author:
    Kenny MacLeod
